typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as integer,
		PhoneNumber as long,
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delimited',
	fileSystem: 'bronze',
	folderPath: 'FourthCoffee/Rentals',
	fileName: 'Customers.csv',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	quoteChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: true) ~> Customers
Customers derive(NewPhoneNumber = toString(PhoneNumber),
		DataSourceId = 3,
		AddressId = uuid(),
		NewZipCode = toString(ZipCode)) ~> AddDataSourceId
AddDataSourceId sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	compressionType: 'snappy',
	compressionLevel: 'Fastest',
	fileSystem: 'silver',
	folderPath: 'Customers',
	mergeSchema: false,
	autoCompact: true,
	optimizedWrite: true,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		CustomerID,
		LastName,
		FirstName,
		PhoneNumber = NewPhoneNumber,
		CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate,
		DataSourceId
	)) ~> CustomerSink
AddDataSourceId sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	compressionType: 'snappy',
	compressionLevel: 'Fastest',
	fileSystem: 'silver',
	folderPath: 'Addresses',
	mergeSchema: false,
	autoCompact: true,
	optimizedWrite: true,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['CustomerID'],
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		AddressID = AddressId,
		CustomerID,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		City,
		State,
		ZipCode = NewZipCode,
		CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate,
		DataSourceId
	)) ~> AddressesSink
